snippet.title: PARAGNOSIA 📷👻 | Launch Trailer | New Anomaly Surveillance Game - OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
PARAGNOSIA Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/3017580/Paragnosia/?utm_source=YOUTUBE&utm_campaign=ReleaseTrailer&utm_medium=Video

---

PARAGNOSIA is a short game in which you monitor a mysterious, atmospheric apartment for anomalies. You control a surveillance camera that glides along a ceiling rail from room to room. Stay sharp: in each round, you must identify and photograph every paranormal occurrence that appears. Locked in your surveillance room, will you survive tonight's 8 rounds?

#anomalygame #horrorgame #surveillancecamera #steam #indiegame #indiegames
